attributes.action: Make it compulsary for GP's to have more mental health training!
attributes.additional_details:
SOME (NOT ALL) GP'S DO NOT KNOW ENOUGH ABOUT MENTAL HEALTH!

We need to stand up against GP's who just disregard those with mental health conditions.

I have come across doctors who will not do adequate investigations for physical illness because the patient must be "making it up" because they have a mental health condition! This must never be the case. Mentally ill or not, everybody has the right to the same investigations without discrimination. The only way to do this is to train them in mental health properly. Please sign and get these ignorant professionals to look at their actions and stop further damage occurring. Thank you.
